p.s: The nameless speech delivered by Michel Barnier on the 1st July 2018 of the European American Chamber of Commerce in New York is about the consequences of the brexitBrexit for the EU and the UK by mostly pointing out upcoming financial problems.
In the first part (l. 1-3) Michel Barnier says, that the Brexit was false and will be negative for both sides (l. 2-3).
After that he mentions in the second part (l. 4-10) that the Brexit will have a change for multiple economic sectors (l. 6-7).
The speaker is pointing out too, that the Brexit will have more a lost for the UK, but the EU will be negativlynegatively influenced too (l. 8-10).
Michel Barnier next theme (l. 11-14) is that businesses have to be ready to adapt their system (l. 12-13) and even prepare for the worst case which is a no-deal.
He appeals in the next part (l. 15-26) that the EU should have a close relationship to the UK (l. 15-16).
Michel Barnier sees that as possible because of the EU Single Market, which is open for third countries (l. 16-17).
He mentions that the UK will have to hold themselves at the regulations of the EU (l. 21-22).
At the end of the part he says that the equivalence system should work for the UK industry like for the US industry great (l. 25-29).
In the last part (l. 27-32) appeals that the EU does not need to change themselves, because of the Brexit and that the EU's open market will still remain like before in the future (l. 31-32).
